title: Design for an After-Dinner Coffee Cup and Saucer, for Castleton China
description:
Detailed perspective and plan for a cup and saucer, complete with measurements. In bottom right, printed in burgundy ink with fields entered in graphite, artist's label: 
eva s. zeisel industrial design
Date: March 45
Title: After Dinner Coffee Cup No. 1234
431 Riverside Drive New York City
name: Drawing
